definition: suffix of a noun of locality
owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: I believe that unilateralism is too expensive and open dialogue is too slow.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲單邊主義代價太高，公開對話效率太低。

sentences.english: In the United States policy of unilateralism, Europe should also be bullied .
sentences.chinese: 在美國的單邊主義政策下，歐洲也要受氣。
